ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have made the Qur'an easy to remember. But is there any rememberer there?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will be warned?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely We have made this Qur'an easy as a reminder. Is there, then, any who will take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We made the Quran easy to understand, but is there anyone who would take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We have indeed made the Qur’an easy to memorise, so is there one who would remember?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed, We have made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember; then is there any that will remember
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We have made the Quran easy for remembrance, but is there anyone who will mind?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Now We have made the Koran easy for Remembrance. Is there any that will remember?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And in truth We have made the Qur'an easy to remember; but is there any that remembereth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Indeed, We have made the Quran easy to learn lessons from. Is there anyone who would receive admonition?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We have made the Qur'an eary for admanirion: is there then any one who would be admonished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We have made the Quran simple for the sake of admonishment. So is there anyone who will be admonished?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed, We have made the Quran easy to understand and remember, then is there any that will remember (or receive admonition)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have made the Koran an easy Remembrance, is there any that will remember!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We made the Quran easy to understand. Is there anyone who would understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:32] And verily We have made the Qur’ān easy to remember. So is there anyone who will remember?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And in truth We have made the Qur'an easy to remember) easy to take admonition from, and easy to memorise and recite; (but is there any that remembers) but is there any that takes admonition from what was done to the folk of Salih and, as a result, desist from transgression? It is also said that this means: is there any that seeks knowledge such that he is helped to acquire it?
